directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: A year-end options expiry for bitcoin is suppressing volatility just as macro and risk-asset positioning turns supportive for a higher...
Gold, silver, and platinum hit record highs as Bitcoin struggles. Analysts watch for a 2026 capital rotation into crypto.
Bitcoin slips over 2% as weak demand and low confidence reinforce selling pressure and keep the long-term downtrend intact.
Bitcoin's price was unable to break above $90000 convincingly and is once again found into a retracement.
Bitcoin slipped below the $88,000 mark on Wednesday, as thin holiday liquidity amplified the modest shifts in sentiment and left markets...

hypothesis_content.title: BTC Volatility Compression Breakout with Options Expiry Catalyst
hypothesis_content.statement: BTC's current consolidation between $85k-$90k, coupled with the imminent options expiry, creates a high-probability setup for a directional breakout. A close above $90,500 on increasing volume (>20% above 20-day average) will signal a bullish breakout targeting $94k, while a close below $84,800 on high volume will signal a bearish breakdown targeting $81.5k.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Options expiry events often catalyze breakouts from compression ranges as large positions are rolled or closed. The current $85k-$90k range represents a clear battleground with defined boundaries. High compression (low Bollinger Band width) indicates pent-up energy likely to resolve directionally.
entry_conditions: Break and close above $90,500 OR below $84,800 on 4-hour candle
Volume on breakout candle > 20% above 20-period moving average

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Bullish: $89,200 (below breakout level) | Bearish: $85,500 (above breakdown level)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if price hasn't moved >2% in breakout direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price breaks range boundary but fails to sustain move, quickly reversing back into range within 4 hours with declining volume (false breakout).
